bayou.tcp

Class TcpChannel2Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • bayou.tcp.TcpChannel2Connection

  • public class TcpChannel2Connection
extends Object
    Convert TcpChannel to TcpConnection.

    This class is for "plain" connections. See SslChannel2Connection instead for SSL connections.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TcpChannel2Connection(int readBufferSize, int writeBufferSize)
      Create a TcpChannel to TcpConnection converter.

    • Method Summary

      Instance Method
      TcpConnection convert(TcpChannel channel)
      Convert a TcpChannel to a TcpConnection.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TcpChannel2Connection

        public TcpChannel2Connection(int readBufferSize,
                             int writeBufferSize)
        Create a TcpChannel to TcpConnection converter.
        Parameters:
        readBufferSize - preferred buffer size for calling TcpChannel.read(java.nio.ByteBuffer).
        writeBufferSize - preferred buffer size for calling TcpChannel.write(java.nio.ByteBuffer...).

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public TcpConnection convert(TcpChannel channel)
        Convert a TcpChannel to a TcpConnection.
